subject: Order #SSN2985
description_text:
Hi,

I’ve noticed an issue with my Simson — when I release the throttle, it
doesn’t return fully to idle. It stays slightly open, providing around 9%
throttle input. I wanted to check if this is normal, and if not, what might
be the cause or recommended fix.

I’ve already confirmed that the throttle doesn’t snap back completely, so I
suspect something like cable tension, spring return, or friction in the
throttle tube. Could you please advise on what I should check or adjust?


Thx
*Sylvio Hardel*
*(+33)767877614*

conversations.body_text: Hi Hardel sylvio,  Please check whether the throttle pedal’s lock nut is properly tightened and apply sufficient preload to ensure the pedal returns smoothly. Additionally, you can click Offset in the software to reset the pedal’s initial signal.

Ok will check that when I am home.

Can you send a picture of the lock nut?

See a video of my issue attached.

Everything up correctly screw so I believe this is the hydro rod which
makes a sandy sounds. Could you please help as I have race league and stuck
with this issue.

Also I cannot find f12025 in your compatible game in sim Manager

*Sylvio Hardel*
*(+33)767877614*

Hi Hardel sylvio,     Please provide your contact name, shipping address, phone number, and order number, and we will send you a replacement throttle hydraulic rod.      https://www.reddit.com/r/simracing/comments/1nj93bq/simsonn_plus_x_pedals_setup_guide_in_f1_25/

Order number in the subject email
Name: Sylvio Hardel
Address: 3 barking wharf square, flat 302 IG117ZS, London
Phone: +447424990740

*Sylvio Hardel*
*(+33)767877614*

Have you send anything?

*Sylvio Hardel*
*(+33)767877614*

Hi Hardel sylvio,    We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Here is your shipping tracking link. Your package is expected to arrive around the 7th.    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045998408815
Hi Hardel sylvio,  Your package has been delivered. Did you not receive it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045998408815

Hello,

After putting the pedal on the new rig which I bought especially for it, I
realised that the pedal plate is too big and would not fit at all.

I would like to return the item for a refund. given I cannot use it which
is unfortunate. Could you please indicate how I should proceed to return
the item.

This is the rig I bought for it so you can make sure in the future it fits.
https://nextlevelracing.com/products/f-gt-pro-formula-and-gt-racing-simulator-cockpit-grey/

*Sylvio Hardel*
*(+33)767877614*

Any update from my latest email?

*Sylvio Hardel*
*(+33)767877614*
Hi Hardel sylvio,     Is the issue with your hydraulic rod still unresolved?

Hello,

The hydraulic rod is now solved but the pedal does not fit in my new
cockpit as I bought it especially for it.

Can you please read my email? I have been repeating myself twice already.

*Quoting my previous email:*
*Quote*
Hello,

After putting the pedal on the new rig which I bought especially for it, I

I would like to return the item for a refund. given I cannot use it which

*Unquoted*
*Sylvio Hardel*
*(+33)767877614*




On Tue, Nov 11, 2025 at 10:58 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Hardel sylvio,     Please confirm whether your packaging is intact. If it meets the following return criteria, we can accept your return request.

I recently purchased the Simsonn Pro X Ultra pedals, and upon testing, I
realized that my racing setup cannot accommodate them due to size
constraints. The item is still in the same condition as received, with no
damage or alterations.

I would like to inquire about the possibility of a return, exchange, or any
other available solution. Please let me know the next steps.

Thank you very much for your time and assistance.

*Sylvio Hardel*
*(+33)767877614*

Any update?

*Sylvio Hardel*
*(+33)767877614*
